SKILLS.TITLE: Skills

CATEGORIES.PROGRAMMING_LANGUAGES_DESCRIPTION: Programming languages are the foundation of modern software development. They are used to create the logic and functionality of applications.
CATEGORIES.FRAMEWORKS_DESCRIPTION: Frameworks are libraries that provide a foundation for building applications. They are used to create the structure and functionality of applications.
CATEGORIES.DATABASES_DESCRIPTION: Databases are used to store and manage data. They are used to create the structure and functionality of applications.
CATEGORIES.TOOLS_DESCRIPTION: Tools are used to create the structure and functionality of applications.
CATEGORIES.DEVOPS_DESCRIPTION: DevOps is the practice of combining software development and IT operations. It is used to create the structure and functionality of applications.
CATEGORIES.DESIGN_DESCRIPTION: Design is the practice of creating the visual and aesthetic elements of applications. It is used to create the structure and functionality of applications.
CATEGORIES.LANGUAGES_DESCRIPTION: Languages are used to create the logic and functionality of applications. They are used to create the structure and functionality of applications.
CATEGORIES.OTHER_DESCRIPTION: Other is used to create the structure and functionality of applications.

SKILLS.NO_SKILLS_ADDED: No skills added. Click 'Add Skill' to start.

FIELDS.LANGUAGE_LABEL: Select the language of your resume
FIELDS.LANGUAGE_DESCRIPTION: The language of your resume will be used to generate the resume in the selected language, both the titles of the sections and the dates of your studies and experiences will be translated.
FIELDS.CLEAR_FIELDS_AFTER_GENERATION: Do you want to clear the fields after generating the resume?
